data.title: Start Round Halls Dart Info
data.description: Send your Recon Bolt down Halls to quickly get info on attackers pushing into A Main.

data.title: Unexpected Recon Bolt For B Elbow From Mid Nest
data.description: This is a useful early round Recon Bolt for B Elbow, some of Mid Cannon, and some of B Main. Using this arrow can be a good way to land an arrow inside of B Elbow in an unexpected way, which increases the likelihood that the arrow will get a scan off and reveal players in that area.
